name: HQSES - Work flow management engine
short_description:
HQSES - Work flow management engine, is a web based solution for managing workflows in a company.You can conduct the following 

1. Audits 
2. Incident recording & resolution 
3. Performance monitoring 
4. Risk management
5. Knowledge management
